Assessment.QuestionText: You want to print a circle using the <font face="courier new">PrintDocument</font> class. Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
Button btnPrint = new Button();
PrintDocument printDoc = new PrintDocument();

private void printDoc_PrintPage(object sender, PrintEventArgs e)
{
   e.PageSettings.Color = true;
   e.Graphics.DrawEllipse(Pens.Green, 30, 30);
}
private void btnPrint_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
   printDoc.DocumentName = "My Document";
   printDoc.Print();
}
